pageContext.claim: “Our country has regained the respect that we used to have long ago, abroad. Yes, they're respecting us again. Yes, America is back.”
pageContext.analysis: With the exception of Russia and Israel, confidence in U.S. leadership has dramatically declined under Trump, according to surveys by the Pew Research Center. Confidence has declined by 75 percent in Germany and the netherlands, 71 percent in South Korea, 70 percent in France, 61 percent in Canada, 57 percent in the United Kingdom and 54 percent in Japan. It declined by 44 percent in Mexico to just five percent.
